name: loopback-swagger
readme:
# loopback-swagger **This module is in Active LTS mode, new features are no longer accepted.**
(See [Module Long Term Support Policy](#module-long-term-support-policy) below.) LoopBack 3 users looking for new features are encouraged to upgrade to LoopBack 4. Refer to [loopback-next#1849](https://github.com/strongloop/loopback-next/issues/1849) for more information on how to upgrade. ## Overview Utilities to transform between Swagger API specs and LoopBack remoting metadata. This is an internal module used by the following user-facing tools: - [slc loopback:swagger](https://docs.strongloop.com/display/LB/Swagger+generator) - [loopback-explorer](https://github.com/strongloop/loopback-explorer) ## Module Long Term Support Policy This module adopts the [ Module Long Term Support (LTS)](http://github.com/CloudNativeJS/ModuleLTS) policy, with the following End Of Life (EOL) dates: | Version | Status | Published | EOL | | ------- | --------------- | --------- | -------- | | 5.x | Active LTS | Sep 2017 | Dec 2019 | | 4.x | Maintenance LTS | Feb 2017 | Apr 2019 | | 3.x | Maintenance LTS | Dec 2016 | Apr 2019 | Learn more about our LTS plan in [docs](https://loopback.io/doc/en/contrib/Long-term-support.html).
